solution_line_template: An hour is equal to {total_playlist_minutes} minutes.

Minnie has {num_three_minute_songs} * {duration_three_minute_song} = <<{num_three_minute_songs}*{duration_three_minute_song}={minutes_already_on_playlist}>>{minutes_already_on_playlist} minutes of songs already on the playlist.
She has to fill {total_playlist_minutes} - {minutes_already_on_playlist} = <<{total_playlist_minutes}-{minutes_already_on_playlist}={minutes_to_fill}>>{minutes_to_fill} more minutes.

Thus, she needs to add {minutes_to_fill} / {duration_four_minute_song} = <<{minutes_to_fill}/{duration_four_minute_song}={num_four_minute_songs_needed}>>{num_four_minute_songs_needed} four-minute songs.
